scripts.zip: rm -f measure-lambda.zip && zip -r measure-lambda.zip index.js node_modules src package.json yarn.lock
scripts.update:faas:prod: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name measure-lambda-prod --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/measure-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.update:faas:qa: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name measure-lambda-qa --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/measure-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.update:faas:dev: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name measure-lambda-dev --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/measure-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:prod
scripts.deploy:qa: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:qa
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn install && yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:dev
